note: Crusty old man. Retired from the AF. Dad/stepdad to several gamers, and one myself. WH40K since ‘89, paintball since ‘92, and still remember playing Pong in ‘80 and owned a copy of the infamous ET game on my 2600 in ‘83. Now I own & replay all Borderlands games often, as well as regular replays of Witcher, Fallout, Skyrim, and others on (finally) my Series X. Fan of Nerd Poker as well as Dungeons & Daddies.
